commit.message:
re PR ada/82127 (gnat.dg/specs/constructor.ads FAILs)

	PR ada/82127
	* gcc-interface/decl.c (copy_and_substitute_in_layout): Put the fields
	in order of increasing position in more cases.

From-SVN: r251846

files.patch:

+	PR ada/82127
+	* gcc-interface/decl.c (copy_and_substitute_in_layout): Put the fields
+	in order of increasing position in more cases.
